eds.database.rename_bad_cols(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, chs: [<class 'str'>] = ["'", '-', ' ', '(', ')', '/']) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Renames the columns with bad names in a dataframe. ‘Bad names’ as in nonacceptable for a database column name. Important Note: ‘Feature1-‘ & ‘Feature1)’ lead to an ambiguity issue. This should be handled by mantaining a hashed dictionary of the new columns.

dfpd.DataFrame

Input DataFrame to convert bad column names from.

chs, optional

List of unacceptable characters, by default [‘’’, ‘-‘, ‘ ‘, ‘(‘, ‘)’, ‘/’].

pd.DataFrame

DataFrame that has no unacceptable column names.
